name: Unknown Region
storyline: You are one of the chosen survivors to set up your life in UNKNOWN REGION. Life has forever changed after an unknown virus has wiped out humanity. Navigate through the region to discover mutated humans and creatures. You will be challenged to test your survival skills. Throughout the region you will craft, build, fight, and scavenge for supplies and battle the elements every step of the way. Design and build base on your own or with your friends. You will need to be one hell of a fighter to survive this.
